title: Swain Q doesn't affect Illaoi tentacles
body:
Hi guys,
it would be great to know if  Illaoi tentacles should/can be destroyed by Swains Q, W, E or R. Currently it looks like that's not possible,

regards.

replies.body:
Only Auto Attacks and Modified Auto Attacks can hit the tentacles.


Here's a few examples
Twisted Fate's W
Darius W
Actually GP cannot target them. It's not an actually AA, it's an ability that procs like an AA.
could of sworn i've shot them a few times. hadnt played him in a while though
Tentacles can only be killed by auto attacks.
